member.name: P:Blacksmiths.Utils.Wolf.SqlServer.SqlServerProvider.ConnectionString
member.summary: Gets the connection string used for this SQL Server connection

member.name: M:Blacksmiths.Utils.Wolf.SqlServer.SqlServerProvider.NewSqlServerConnection(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new SQL Server data connection service
member.param: Connection string to use to connect to the database

member.name: M:Blacksmiths.Utils.Wolf.SqlServer.SqlServerProvider.NewSqlServerConnectionFromCfg(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new SQL Server data connection from your application configuration
member.param: Optional. The name of a connection string in your configuration to use for this connection.

member.name: P:Blacksmiths.Utils.Wolf.Utility.WolfOptionsSqlServer.ConnectionString
member.summary: Gets or sets the SQL Server connection string to use for the connection to the database.

member.name: P:Blacksmiths.Utils.Wolf.Utility.WolfOptionsSqlServer.ConnectionStringName
member.summary: Gets or sets the case-sensitive name of a configuration connection string found in the "ConnectionStrings" section to use for the connection to the database. Only used if "ConnectionString" is not set.
